programme.title: In the Footsteps of Killers
programme.desc: David, Emilia and Dr Graham Hill examine the case of eight-year-old Vishal Mehrotra, whose remains were found in West Sussex seven months after he went missing in London in 1981.

programme.desc: Ania Magliano asks a stranger about their marital status, Phil Ellis strips to his base layer and Reece Shearsmith destroys a valuable ornament. Throughout it all, Greg Davies expertly maintains order with his usual stern authority.

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Property experts help British couples who are looking to move from their home in dreary Britain for the sun, sea and sand abroad.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton helps Sandra and Laurence look for a sun-drenched delight on Spains Costa Almería for their budget of £90k. Will a spacious solarium or a suntrap of a terrace tempt them?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In the Welsh Valleys, the first to host is dog lover Kerry Bowell-Williams. She keeps the food simple while welcoming her guests with a full Welsh choir in her driveway.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Second to host in the Welsh Valleys is confident foodie Dave Morris, who hopes his home-grown herbs, hand-picked fruit and complicated menu will win him the prize.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Shop owner Tasnim Sardar is third to host in the Welsh Valleys and hopes her Pakistani-inspired party will bag her the prize. Financial advisor Gill Leonard prefers her curries, like her men, to be hot and spicy.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Man about town Ryan Woodward is the latest to host in the Welsh Valleys. Ryan has put a lot of thought into his dinner party and yet each of his courses goes wrong.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the final night in the Welsh Valleys and the turn of financial advisor Gill Leonard to don the oven gloves. Theres a dramatic beginning to the evening thanks to a fire breathing dragon.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Ussy and Bobsey host at Optimal Apartments, their luxury self-catering digs in the heart of Bradford. Unfortunately for the hosts, some of their guests are not sure that flat-pack furniture equates to luxury.

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Ministers Chris and Caroline need some divine intervention with their home in Alnwick. Chris is ready for a change of scenery and a bigger, more user-friendly space, while Caroline loves their home, and particularly their neighbours.

programme.title: Hotel Chocolat Unwrapped

programme.title: Grand Designs

programme.title: Grand Designs

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Building of Britain
programme.desc: Fred focuses on Scottish baronial style. At Glamis Castle, Fred reveals how a simple sandstone tower house was transformed with the help of stonemasons from Aberdeen and plasterers from Italy. In addition, he visits the house of Dun near Montrose and Culezean Castle on the Ayshire coast.

programme.title: The Channel Tunnel: Life on the Inside
The Good Life
programme.desc: The Goods decide to try their needles at making their own clothes. Meanwhile, Jerry is jockeying for the position of managing director of JJM, with Margo providing some Machiavellian assistance.

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: The mass media coach Jim Hacker on how to present his defence strategy on national television.

programme.title: Call My Bluff
programme.desc: Robert Robinson hosts a game of word definitions and deceptions. Captains Frank Muir and Patrick Campbell are joined by Tom Baker, Alan Coren, Gabrielle Drake and Miriam Stoppard.

programme.title: Face the Music
programme.desc: Joseph Cooper invites viewers to match their musical wits against Judith Jackson, Robin Ray and Patrick Moore. With guest musician Louis Kentner.

programme.title: Storyville
programme.desc: When Russia invades Ukraine, a quiet schoolteacher in a small industrial town picks up his camera and becomes an unlikely dissident. Pavel Talankin isnt a journalist or activist. He organises school events, makes quirky videos and is loved by his students. But when patriotic lessons and military drills begin replacing regular classes, Pavel starts filming. What emerges is a chilling portrait of how propaganda seeps into everyday life and how even children are drawn into the machinery of war.

programme.title: Blood and Gold: The Making of Spain with Simon Sebag Montefiore
programme.desc: Simon uncovers the truth about Spains hero El Cid. He also investigates the horror of the Spanish Inquisition and in the process discovers an unsettling story about one of his own ancestors.

programme.title: Timeshift
programme.sub-title: How to Write a Mills and Boon
programme.desc: To mark 100 years of romance publishers Mills and Boon, literary novelist Stella Duffy takes on the challenge of writing for them. Romantic fiction is a global phenomenon, and Mills and Boon are among the biggest names in the business. The company welcomes submissions from new authors, but as Duffy soon finds out, writing a Mills and Boon is harder than it looks.

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Building of Britain
programme.desc: Fred focuses on Scottish baronial style. At Glamis Castle, Fred reveals how a simple sandstone tower house was transformed with the help of stonemasons from Aberdeen and plasterers from Italy. In addition, he visits the house of Dun near Montrose and Culezean Castle on the Ayshire coast.

programme.title: The Channel Tunnel: Life on the Inside
Henry VIII: Patron or Plunderer?
programme.desc: In the 1530s, King Henry VIII was at a crossroads. In his desperation for a new wife and an heir, he had broken with Rome, divorced Katherine of Aragon and married Anne Boleyn. Isolated and vulnerable, he needed a powerful new image as head of church and state. Jonathan Foyle looks for clues in the kings art to glimpse what was going on inside Henrys head as he faced his darkest days.

programme.desc: How did vulnerable 43-year-old Julius Matera end up being left for dead in Eccles, Manchester? And police urge any other victims of a male rapist to come forward.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: A large home in Barry in south Wales, a terrace in Nuneaton in Warwickshire and a quirky one-bedroom flat in a Victorian former schoolhouse on the Isle of Wight are sold at auction. Martin, Martel and Jacqui meet the new owners and hear their plans for their investment projects.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Charlie Ross travels to Shrewsbury in Shropshire, where Tim Weeks and Ben Cooper provide expert help as the red and blue teams compete to see who can make the most profit at auction. Charlie goes round the fair quizzing members of the public on a rather unusual antique he has brought along.

programme.title: Trace, Track, Get My Car Back
programme.desc: Tracker Neil hunts down a stolen Toyota Hilux hidden on a remote industrial estate. But before he can seize it, hes confronted by a man claiming he bought it at an auction.

programme.title: Lost and Found in the Lakes
programme.desc: The scuba team dive to their greatest depth yet to search on behalf of heartbroken newlyweds. Crafter Lucy takes on a shattered teapot fished out of the water and attempts to make something truly special out of it. And social media detective Mui tries to get a phone full of memories back to its rightful owner.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson explores one of the UKs most beautiful locations today as he sets about finding the ideal Wye Valley property for his house hunters. Having put their Portugal home on the market, theyve recently been touring the UK in their beloved camper van named Dave and are itching to settle down somewhere with more space inside and out!

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: The team rescue a jacket worn by a beloved search dog involved in the Lockerbie disaster, as well as tackle a pair of rugby boots that helped England win the Womens World Cup.

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz, packed with strategy, high stakes and surprises, where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash - anything between zero and a whopping £4,000.

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: The team restores a photo of President Kennedys children with their English nanny, a tiny drum kit clock, a melted wax statuette and a traditional Venezuelan stringed instrument.

programme.title: See Hear
programme.desc: Reality TV star Ross McCarthy joins Rolf Choutan to chat all things sport. Featuring a would-be Deaflympian swimmer as well as the first deaf woman to swim the English Channel.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: The Finish Line
programme.desc: Roman Kemp hosts this brand new quiz show with sidekick Sarah Greene where contestants race on moving podiums across the studio floor. Correct answers get the players moving, while wrong answers will stop them in their tracks.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The competition intensifies as the eight rivals compete to cook the final course, dessert. The guest judge is Dame Jessica Ennis-Hill, a heptathlete who became one of the most celebrated British competitors when she won gold at London 2012.

programme.title: Trawlermen: Hunting the Catch
programme.desc: Its the last trip before Christmas and, with demand surging, fish prices are rising. Off the south coast of Cornwall, Ocean Pride is heading out in pursuit of pollock among the old sunken shipwrecks of the English Channel. 380 miles away on the Yorkshire coast, crabber Tydus is preparing to head out with hopes of a big pay day. The aim is to put six tons in the tank, a catch that this week could fetch well over £30,000.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Members of the public bring their antiques to be viewed and valued.

programme.desc: Una Healy, Joanna Page, Jack P Shepherd and Emmanuel Sonubi test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Fleur East dishes up all the behind-the-scenes action from the world of Strictly Come Dancing. And Choreography Corner dissects the rest of the weekends movie-themed performances.

programme.title: The Crash Detectives
programme.desc: When a cyclist dies just nine minutes into a time trial on a dual carriageway, a van drivers arrested. But a single mark on the road surface raises more questions than answers.

programme.title: Mastermind
programme.desc: Clive Myrie asks the questions in another heat where the contenders answer questions on the films of Billy Wilder, Neil Diamond and the Apollo space program.

programme.title: Only Connect
programme.sub-title: Whitley Baes v Oh No They Didnt
programme.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz where knowledge only gets you so far. Neither team has lost a match so far - but thats about to change.

programme.title: University Challenge
programme.sub-title: Magdalen College, Oxford v Robinson College, Cambridge
programme.desc: The first round of the competition concludes with a match between Magdalen College, Oxford and Robinson College, Cambridge. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

programme.title: Spotlight
programme.desc: Infiltrating a secretive online network forcing dogs to fight and die. Patrick Fee goes undercover to expose a dog fighting ring stretching from Antrim to Amsterdam.

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: The fabulous Babátúnde Aleshe introduces Chloe Petts and Lindsey Santoro to the stage.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Rob Brydons Honky Tonk Road Trip
programme.desc: Rob Brydon continues his musical adventure through the southern states of America, celebrating 100 years of country music. He ventures deep into the Appalachian Mountains - the birthplace of countrys vibrant and diverse roots.

programme.title: See Hear
programme.desc: Reality TV star Ross McCarthy joins Rolf Choutan to chat all things sport. Featuring a would-be Deaflympian swimmer as well as the first deaf woman to swim the English Channel.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.sub-title: Countryfile Ramble for BBC Children in Need 2025
programme.desc: The Countryfile Ramble for BBC Children in Need is back! And this year, for the very first time, Ramble HQ is based on a farm, on the Staffordshire-Shropshire border.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors
programme.desc: Claudia Winkleman greets a group of celebrities as they arrive at a beautiful castle in the Scottish Highlands to play the ultimate reality game of detection, back-stabbing and trust.

programme.title: The Celebrity Traitors: Uncloaked
programme.desc: Ed catches up with the murdered and banished players to get the scoop on all the backstabbing and treachery that goes on inside the castle. And he welcomes players from series past to give their reactions and expert analysis on the game.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: The Disappearing Mushler; Bouncing Back; Morel in the Dark; Save The Fun Tree; Stuck In The Mud
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.desc: Revolving around an adventurous moles quest with friends to broker peace between humans and moles. Following the underground adventures of the charmingly optimistic young mole, Moley.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: With Destroido pumping toxic waste into the land around Crystal Cove, the gang are called in to investigate a monstrous bear like creature terrorising the area.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!
programme.desc: The meddling Scooby gang are asked by a professor to help set up a Mummy exhibition, but the prized exhibit keeps disappearing.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: The Scooby Gang heads to the eerie town of Banning Junction to spend Halloween with Velmas aunt, uncle and her beautiful and flirtatious cousin Marcy. The townspeople celebrate 100 Years of Halloween, including a crowning of the Queen of the Masquerade Ball and a performance by KISS. When spine-tingling events begin to occur, a fearful townswoman blames it on a ghost whos come back for revenge.

programme.title: Scooby Doo: Ghastly Goals
programme.desc: Entertainment programming.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: Cher, Scooby And The Sargasso Sea!
programme.desc: Scooby-Doo and the gang are hitching a ride with their friend Cher on her yacht coming back from the Azores to the Caribbean; they run aground in the strange Sargasso Sea full of thick Sargassum seaweed and a graveyard of old ships of all kinds.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Freds worst nightmare comes true when an evil spirit possesses the Mystery Machine and turns his beloved van into an unrelenting monster.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: The Fast and the Wormious; Homeward Hound

programme.desc: Daphne gets a call from a friend that needs help. The gang heads to Nashville, Tennessee to meet up with none other than country music legend Kacey Musgraves! / When investigating a haunted old hospital, Scooby-Doo and the gang meet up.

programme.sub-title: A Scooby-Doo Halloween; Riva Ras Regas
programme.desc: The Scooby Gang heads to the eerie town of Banning Junction to spend Halloween with Velmas aunt. / The gang investigate claims that the ghost of a magician is haunting the concert hall where their friend is playing.

programme.sub-title: Night of the Upsetting Shorts; Junkyard Dogs

programme.sub-title: A Haunt of A Thousand Voices!; What a Night for a Dark Knight!
programme.desc: Daphne takes the rest of the gang to meet her friend, famous voice over actor Frank Welker. When Scooby and the gang go to Gotham City to visit Alfred Pennyworth, they stumble into a dangerous mystery!

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: San Franpsycho; A Terrifying Round With A Menacing Metallic Clown
programme.desc: While attending the Grind Games, the gang runs into the ghost of an Alcatraz prisoner who is targeting members of the competition. Shaggy competes in a mini golf tournament that is terrorised by a giant metallic clown.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy and Scooby discover their new favourite food as the gang investigates the mystery of a frightening Sorcerer thats haunting a snack factory!

programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Great Potato Blunder
programme.desc: When Peter hears about his fathers greatest heist, he embarks on some high-risk highway robbery - Mr McGregors entire wheelbarrow of potatoes on its way to market!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts expand their exploration beyond the sea - and onto land. With new rides and new friends, they are prepared to protect any habitats and animals at risk on land or under the water.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: It is the double doors challenge! How will the Numberblocks solve Fifteens puzzles?

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: A makes friends with a cat but soon starts sneezing and bouncing all over. Her friends try to help, but everything they do only makes things worse. How can she sneak away from the cat? This episode has fun with the letters A, C, P, T and N and the words cat, can, pat, tap, cap, nap and dog.

programme.title: Nick Copes Popcast
programme.desc: After doing some exercise to start the day, Nick and Norman spot a moth and a sloth and realise that sometimes its fun to take things nice and slow.

programme.title: Justins House
programme.desc: Justin Fletcher entertains a live audience of children with singing, dancing and comedy chaos. Things turn messy when Robert invents a cake-making machine. Guest starring Katy Ashworth.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Sula help Amma to get lunch ready. Bing watches yummy peas and delicious carrots go into the pot, but when lunch is served theyre all mixed up together and Bing doesnt like it. Amma finds Bing an unmixing spoon so that Bing can enjoy his lunch just the way he likes it.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Yakka Dee! celebrates children communicating - because talking fills you up with whizz, pop, bang! In this episode, Dee encourages a friend to say worm and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see a long worm, a little worm and a squirmy worm. Look out for the speedy worm and the greedy worm, the jelly worm and the welly worm! Dee enjoys a glow worm and we see a little girl make a muddy worm from her finger.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.desc: The bugs get creative with new chalk until some of it runs out.

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos are at an ice rink, where they watch a young girl twirling around. The Twirlywoos cant resist having a go themselves, but when they try to twirl they find its trickier than it looks!

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Justin and his friends learn all about getting their eyes tested. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble helps Grandad Tumble with some new glasses when he loses his old pair.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies become a pop group and perform a pop song. In Tummy Tales, children watch a one-man band playing music and accompany him by playing their own music.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Nigel and Baby Bear welcome babies Layla, George, Isobel, Lincoln, Jason, Willow and their grown-ups. Inside everyones bags are different types of paper, which are explored through discovery, play, song and story.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: Its bowling time! Dad thinks hes a pro - but hes the only one not scoring. Maddie and Triggs sing a doo-wop song to help him focus and find his strike!

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan imagines hes hotel manager wants to help a guest enjoy their stay at his hotel, but he soon discovers that giving his guest a good nights sleep can be pretty exhausting!

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Kiri, Lou and Sorry have a running race, and Kiri is shocked to discover that their new friend is way faster than she is.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Not wanting to go to bed, Bluey tries to dream about being a nocturnal fruit bat so she can stay up all night long and soon finds herself flying through the night sky.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Catchers arrive on a planet populated by chalkboards with drawn features, which possess magic chalks capable of animating any stroke.

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Celery performing Were Here to Grow, if he manages to squeeze himself out of the dressing room on time.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Timmy and his friends are having great fun playing pirates. Timmy is the captain and leads his chums on a treasure hunt. When they find the X that marks the spot theres a big surprise in store - especially for Harriet, who has lost her necklace.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.sub-title: Queen Audrey Goes to the Beach
programme.desc: All rise for Queen Audrey. She plays a fun royal game and holds a special tea party for one of her favourite dolls. There are also lots of jewels and sparkles with some precious home-made necklaces.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Larrys Chinese Tofu, Egg and Prawn
programme.desc: Preschool series celebrating foods from a rich diversity of backgrounds. Larrys family come from China. China is famous for its wonderful food, so Larrys friends are very excited to come over for his Chinese-themed meal. Larrys steamed tofu, egg and prawn recipe is cooked in his mums special steamer but it can be made in an ordinary oven too. Larrys mum has even made some vegetable fried rice to serve with his dish.

programme.title: Ferne and Rorys Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Tommy wants to know everything about very jumpy creatures, grasshoppers. Chantelle is at a zoo to go on a jungle safari with Heather. They meet stick insects and praying mantises.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Oliver and his friends have a fun PE lesson with the school sports coach, Mr Beresford. They are pretending to be in a farmyard and cross different obstacles to collect the feed and take it to the chickens. The children take a break and refuel with a healthy fruit snack before Mrs Farrell shows them how to feel calm with a bit of tapping.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?
programme.desc: Vet Hannah shows how her ultrasound scanner can look at an animals lungs and hearts to check that they are healthy.

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Motorbike rider Grace rolls up her sleeves to try out some amazing cleaning machines. Grace has a challenge in a road sweeper, shows off the incredible rail ballast cleaner and heads to the beach to try out a sand cleaner.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say shoes and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. This episode is all about shoes - brown shoes, blue shoes, shiny shoes and new shoes. We see flashy shoes and dashy shoes, loud shoes and even flying shoes!

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: All aboard for a riotous railway ride as the Numberblocks try to stop a runaway train. Learn all the number bonds up to five with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: OO and friends discover a talking book and some missing words and a pile of letters. Can they put the story of Little Red Riding Hood back together?

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Secret Agent Chicken is outside the farmyard. She is on an important mission to get into the hen house, but her attempts at climbing, tunnelling, flying or karate-chopping her way in, have failed.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Black joins the Printing Crew. Learn how yellow, cyan, magenta and black work together in printing with the Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Snail is thrilled to be moving house as she wishes to escape the wet and sploshy place she currently calls home to a more spacious house on the hill. But before she can move up in the world, shes going to need some help from Duggee and the Squirrels to move her many belongings up the hill. Snail cant do it alone, so Duggee teaches the Squirrels the best ways that they can get moving! They band together, cradling items and shifting furniture.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: Without her ukulele, Yukee struggles to come up with a tune for the words she wrote for a new song. Her friends try to help, but none of their styles fit. Can the piano Sonny and Paulie the peacock bring to the Sunhouse be the answer?

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Justin and his friend take a boat trip to spot some wildlife. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble creates a beach in his garden, but things dont entirely go to plan.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa, and Po play football. The Teletubbies ball goes inside Home Dome, just as the Tubby Phone begins to ring. Its time for a Tubby Phone Dance! The children in Tummy Tales enjoy a football lesson.

programme.title: Andys Safari Adventures
programme.desc: When Andy leaves his sandwich in the lion enclosure, it attracts an infestation of flies, just as Mr Hammond is hoping to take pictures of the lions for the parks website. Andy jets off to Africa in his safari-mobile to see how lions in the wild deal with flies. Along the way he meets an agama lizard who just might have the solution to Andys predicament.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: The Brooklyn-Bells are looking after the kitten from Jesss veterinary practice. When Waffle checks on the kitten, its not in its bed. In fact, the kitten is nowhere to be seen. The Brooklyn-Bells dont see it disappear into the utility cupboard and through the tunnel to Mrs Hobbss house next door. When Mrs Hobbs meets the kitten, she mistakes it for her beloved cat George. She falls in love with the kitten and doesnt want it to leave.

programme.title: Topsy and Tim
programme.desc: Its the start of the summer holidays - and Mummy is six months pregnant! The twins are going to have a little brother! Topsy and Tim take Grandmas new puppy, Pippa, to a puppy training class and to the park.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is determined to copy all the noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle, until he hears Topsy whistling. Try as he might, Raa Raa just cant whistle. All his jungle friends help Raa Raa to learn to whistle.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: When they land on the planet of Fairy Tales, the Fairy Tales meet two alien children. They immediately want to play with their new friends, but they are so sleepy that they can hardly keep their eyes open.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: When hungry gulper eels as well as undersea tremors threaten Inkling and Kwazii, Dashi uses the new, multi-purpose Octo Max Suit to rescue them.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Grumpy Owl
programme.desc: When Old Brown takes Peters journal, Peter must choose between saving his most precious possession and saving a friend.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is cleaning the clubhouse so the Squirrels take refuge in the treehouse, but its getting a little bit cramped. Norrie has an idea, they need to add an extension.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: When animal after animal show up at Vidas clinic with a mysterious rash, shes determined to find a cause. Its poison ivy!

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato and the Tato Team go on a trolley cruise, but its a trap set by Evil Pea.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: When Dad runs out of marmalade Big Lizard shows Cosima a plant growing Proximan oranges. Its leaves turn out to be giant bugs, who arent happy about sharing their fruit!

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Mojo needs to deliver a pizza to a very hard-to-reach island, but some stubborn seabirds have their eye on the pizza. Will Mojo have to go supersonic to get past them?

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want to play restaurant with Grandad, but its a little different than hes used to. Hes going to need an app to order the food.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want a lick of each others ice cream. But they are so focused on making sure each lick is fair, they dont notice their ice creams are melting.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: The Piripenguins fall under the spell of a magical Merguin, a mermaid-penguin, who changes their personalities. But all is not as it seems.

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: Dodge is determined to win the Class Star award, but with Cherry winning every week for being a superstar at everything, its going to be tough! Dodge, Woofer and Jazz try to hatch a plan, but when Jazz and Dodge get swept up in their ideas, like getting Miss Collie a gift, they ignore Woofers advice that theres a better way. Dodge brings Miss Collie a gift into the classroom from the playground and chaos ensues, leaving Dodge with no hope of winning the class star.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: AJ takes Evie and Anaya swimming, but Waffle must stay at home with Simon. Refusing to miss out on the fun, Waffle begins an adventure of his own and sets off to find Evie.

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: Isabelle and Oona are getting distracted as they meet their friends. Baba takes Lala under his little wing. Looks like Baba can take care of himself now! And Lala! Well done, Baba.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.sub-title: Autumn: Its Time to Write a Book
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran are at the library trying to find a new Captain Chloe book, but it seems that shes read them all. JoJo asks Terrence the librarian if theres a book about Captain Chloe and pandas. Unfortunately, Terrence isnt sure there is one.

programme.title: Moon and Me
programme.desc: Mr Onion shows Pepi Nana his toy bridge and Pepi Nana wishes she could step, step, step across the bridge with him.

programme.title: Clangers
programme.desc: Tiny, Small, the Froglets and Baby Dragon are having great fun playing games with the Cloud. But when Major calls them all in for bed, the Cloud is left alone and sad.

programme.title: In the Night Garden
programme.desc: The Pontipines are looking for the perfect place to have a picnic. They try the stones, the log, the pebbles and then they try the branch. The Pontipines call the Wottingers on the Trubliphone and invite them to the picnic.

programme.desc: Mary and Ian dream of owning a holiday home in Portugal and have their hearts set on the glistening Silver Coast. Will a mind-blowing bungalow impress them enough to part with their £215k?

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: In an egg-ception Bake Off first, its Meringue Week, and the bakers whisk up tarts, souffles and ice cream cake. Who can keep their cool and whose souffle will be in disarray?

programme.title: Worlds Apart
programme.desc: The treasure hunters arrive in Kyoto, famed for its stunning temples and rich cuisine. As some teams bond, others clash. With the stakes rising, no ones safe in the quest for £50k.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: Some of the celebrities watching the most talked about TV this week are Rylan Clark Jamali Maddix, Martin Kemp, Judi Love, Zoe Ball, Deborah Meaden and Peter Jones. And Bez.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Britains sharpest armchair critics share more of their sharp, insightful, passionate and sometimes emotional critiques of the weeks biggest and best shows on television.

programme.title: Hunted
programme.desc: Fourteen civilians become fugitives, attempting a daring escape from Stansted Airport to win a share of £100,000. They must evade Chief Ray Howard and his crack team of hunters for 21 days.

programme.title: Hunted
programme.desc: With one fugitive already cleared from the board, the hunters are hungry for more. Could the loved-up couple in the hot tub be their next capture, or will sibling rivalry be another fugitives undoing?

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits the kitchens of six restaurants that he altered when they were about to close their doors.

programme.title: Grand Designs: Deconstructed
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud and Greg James dish the dirt on the latest episode of Grand Designs. Marcus and Abi discuss their convention-defying, plush Pembrokeshire project.

programme.title: Jamies One-Pan Wonders
programme.desc: Jamie cooks his take on shakshuka with asparagus, broccoli and harissa, and an outrageously good pulled pork that can be batched up and used in loads of meals whenever you need it.

programme.title: Cinebuzz
programme.desc: The host interviews various media personalities, shares the latest news of the Bollywood industry and reviews the newest movies.

programme.title: Angrezi Mein Kehte Hain
programme.desc: When love goes flying out of the window, a middle-aged couple struggles to keep their lives together and rekindle their romance that was long buried under the burden of domestic responsibilities.

programme.title: I Proud to Be an Indian
programme.desc: An Indian man travels to London for a family wedding and finds his family live in fear of the terrorism by National Front skinheads. By becoming involved it only escalates the situation.

programme.title: Joroo Ka Ghulam
programme.desc: Kalpana and Rajesh have a chance encounter, which eventually leads to love. Her father is opposed to their marriage, but the pair defy him.

programme.title: Yugpurush
programme.desc: A man battles against his mental illness, as he attempts to build up a new life for himself, upon being released from the hospital.

programme.title: Deewaar
programme.desc: Two brothers who have grown up on different sides of the law find themselves headed for a showdown in modern-day India.

programme.title: Main Hoon Na
programme.desc: Major Ram is assigned with two missions, one is to protect a fragile peace initiative with Pakistan called Project Milap, and the other is to protect the daughter of General Bakshi, the commander in charge of Project Milap. The project takes him to St. Pauls College in Darjeeling, where he must go undercover as a student. As a mature student, Major Ram becomes a misfit with the hip college students.

programme.title: Khuda Gawah
programme.desc: A man breaks Indian law while fulfilling a pledge to his soon-to-be wife, and is sent to jail after his wedding.

programme.title: Ishqiya
programme.desc: While on the run, Kalujaan and Babban fall for a kidnappers seductive widow. The three plan to commit a crime unaware of the fate that awaits them.

programme.title: 99 Songs
programme.desc: A tortured but passionate singer-songwriter is challenged to compose 100 songs before he can marry the girl he loves.

programme.title: Dhaakad Beera
programme.desc: With courage as his superpower, eight-year-old Samrat becomes a one-man army for his baby sister Kishmishs right to live in a world ruled by cruel conventions he doesnt understand.

programme.desc: Lord Shiva and his wife, the Goddess Parvati, navigate their relationship and duties whilst offering sacrifices in their mission to care for humanity.

programme.desc: While Rachel tries to sort out her mixed feelings for her handsome colleague Gavin, Ross recruits Chandler to help him meet attractive women and make Rachel jealous. programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: When Eve is suspended from school for calling a boy a bad name, Mike is surprised name calling would be considered bullying.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra spends a whole day cooking with Marie in an effort to get along with her mother-in-law, and Ray reluctantly agrees to take Robert and Frank to a car show.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray worries that he has passed on stupid genes to Michael because his son may be held back a year at school, just like Ray was.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: The mayor agrees to a mock election with a disc jockey; the women in the office compete for the water delivery man.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Michaels high-school girlfriend reminds him of a promise they made to reunite if they were both single when they reached thirty.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: A visit from Mikes mother Macy turns into something unexpected when she hits it off with the mayor; Paul is sued by the security guard who shot him.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.desc: Mike must choose to protect either his mother or the mayor when a scandal erupts, and Paul goes to `The Peoples Court.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss New Girlfriend
programme.desc: Ross comes back from China with his new girlfriend Julie, and Rachel has a really hard time dealing with it. She winds up sleeping with Paolo and hates herself for it. Joey persuades her to tell Ross how she feels, but when Ross tells her he is in love with Julie, she cant bring herself to do it.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Breast Milk
programme.desc: While Carol and Susan are away, Ross and the friends babysit his newborn son Ben, but Ross is disgusted when Phoebe tests the temperature of some bottled breast milk on her wrist. Meanwhile, Joey competes with a fellow cologne salesman.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: When downstairs neighbour Mr Heckles dies, the friends clean out his apartment, but Chandler becomes convinced his hyper-critical nature will mean he ends up alone and sad, just like Heckles.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Everyone is surprised when Phoebes husband - a gay Canadian ice dancer - shows up, as nobody knew she was married. Elsewhere, Chandler reveals his third nipple, and Ross new relationship is under attack, unbeknown to him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Five Steaks and an Eggplant
programme.desc: Monica gets promoted and invites the friends out for dinner to celebrate, but problems arise when the difference in their salaries becomes apparent and the group splits in two. Meanwhile, when Chandler sets a woman up to get a date with her, a case of mistaken identities means that he discovers what she really thought of him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Baby on the Bus
programme.desc: Joey and Chandler babysit Ben, who turns out to be a babe-magnet until they accidentally leave him on a bus. Meanwhile, Phoebe loses her job as the singer at Central Perk to Stephanie.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Finds Out
programme.desc: Ross and Julie announce they are getting a cat together, while Rachel gets drunk on a date and all she talks about is Ross. She decides to get closure by calling him and telling his machine she is over him. Meanwhile, Chandler regrets asking Monica to help him lose weight.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross agonises over whether he should stay with Julie or date Rachel. The gang encourage him to compare the two, so he starts with a list of Rachels negative qualities. Unfortunately, Rachel sees the list.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out that her picture of her father, whom she has never known, is just a generic photograph that comes with the picture frame. Elsewhere, after Ross makes Monicas heater malfunction, her Christmas party guests swelter in the middle of winter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey gets a great acting opportunity on `Days of our Lives, Rachel dates a guy called Russ who is amazingly similar to Ross, and Monica renews her relationship with `Fun Bobby, but finds out Bobby is only fun when he is drinking.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Lesbian Wedding
programme.desc: Rachels free-spirited mother visits and reveals that she wants to end her marriage and experiment sexually. Meanwhile, Carol and Susan prepare for their wedding, with some help from an uncomfortable Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After The Super Bowl - Part 1
programme.desc: Joey starts dating a fan who is gorgeous, but soon discovers that shes also quite mad. Meanwhile, Ross is reminded how much he misses Marcel his old pet monkey, and travels to San Diego Zoo to find out what has happened to him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After The Super Bowl - Part 2
programme.desc: Ross (David Schwimmer) catches up with Marcel on the set of a movie starring Jean-Claude Van Damme; Chandler gets a date with a girl he liked in fourth grade.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Prom Video
programme.desc: When Monicas parents clear out her old room to install a gym, they unearth an old video of her and Rachels first prom night. Its obvious from this that Ross is in love with Rachel and, having told him it will never happen, Rachel changes her mind. Elsewhere, Joey gives Chandler a hideous bracelet as a token of his friendship and is mortally offended to hear Chandler saying how terrible it is.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel ... You Know
programme.desc: Among the guests at Monicas party is a handsome and sophisticated doctor, but the only problem is that hes old enough to be her father. Meanwhile, Joey buys a big screen TV and two reclining leather armchairs with the money from his `Days of Our Lives contract.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Moves Out
programme.desc: Everyone at Monicas dads birthday party finds it amusing that their middle-aged friend, eye-doctor Richard Burke, is dating a woman in her 20s - until Monicas parents learn that it is their daughter. Meanwhile, Chandler and Joey row over a dirty spoon. Is the apartment still big enough for both of them?

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: With their marriage on the rocks, uptight couple Cynthia and Jason convince their friends to join them on a luxury holiday geared towards healing relationship rifts. Arriving at the beautiful Eden resort, the four couples are in for a shock when they discover the punishing regime that awaits them at this island paradise.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Gary plays a Hollywood Director, trying to marshal the cast through an Indiana Jones style scene.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: In Dating App, singleton Greg chooses between Waynes butt detective, Colins obsessive alien and Ryans trashy fairy godmother. Guest Chris Lee joins.

programme.sub-title: Q and Sal and Joel Dommett
programme.desc: Brian `Q Quinn and Sal Vulcanos tipsy take on a presidential disaster, and Chris ODowd stars in Joel Dommetts drunken Dambusters. Joe Wilkinson, Joe Thomas and Brett Goldstein also feature.

programme.desc: Everyone is surprised when Phoebes husband - a gay Canadian ice dancer - shows up, as nobody knew she was married. Elsewhere, Chandler reveals his third nipple, and Ross new relationship is under attack, unbeknown to him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Five Steaks and an Eggplant
programme.desc: Monica gets promoted and invites the friends out for dinner to celebrate, but problems arise when the difference in their salaries becomes apparent and the group splits in two. Meanwhile, when Chandler sets a woman up to get a date with her, a case of mistaken identities means that he discovers what she really thought of him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Baby on the Bus
programme.desc: Joey and Chandler babysit Ben, who turns out to be a babe-magnet until they accidentally leave him on a bus. Meanwhile, Phoebe loses her job as the singer at Central Perk to Stephanie.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Finds Out
programme.desc: Ross and Julie announce they are getting a cat together, while Rachel gets drunk on a date and all she talks about is Ross. She decides to get closure by calling him and telling his machine she is over him. Meanwhile, Chandler regrets asking Monica to help him lose weight.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross agonises over whether he should stay with Julie or date Rachel. The gang encourage him to compare the two, so he starts with a list of Rachels negative qualities. Unfortunately, Rachel sees the list.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out that her picture of her father, whom she has never known, is just a generic photograph that comes with the picture frame. Elsewhere, after Ross makes Monicas heater malfunction, her Christmas party guests swelter in the middle of winter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey gets a great acting opportunity on `Days of our Lives, Rachel dates a guy called Russ who is amazingly similar to Ross, and Monica renews her relationship with `Fun Bobby, but finds out Bobby is only fun when he is drinking.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Lesbian Wedding
programme.desc: Rachels free-spirited mother visits and reveals that she wants to end her marriage and experiment sexually. Meanwhile, Carol and Susan prepare for their wedding, with some help from an uncomfortable Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After The Super Bowl - Part 1
programme.desc: Joey starts dating a fan who is gorgeous, but soon discovers that shes also quite mad. Meanwhile, Ross is reminded how much he misses Marcel his old pet monkey, and travels to San Diego Zoo to find out what has happened to him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After The Super Bowl - Part 2
programme.desc: Ross (David Schwimmer) catches up with Marcel on the set of a movie starring Jean-Claude Van Damme; Chandler gets a date with a girl he liked in fourth grade.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Prom Video
programme.desc: When Monicas parents clear out her old room to install a gym, they unearth an old video of her and Rachels first prom night. Its obvious from this that Ross is in love with Rachel and, having told him it will never happen, Rachel changes her mind. Elsewhere, Joey gives Chandler a hideous bracelet as a token of his friendship and is mortally offended to hear Chandler saying how terrible it is.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel ... You Know
programme.desc: Among the guests at Monicas party is a handsome and sophisticated doctor, but the only problem is that hes old enough to be her father. Meanwhile, Joey buys a big screen TV and two reclining leather armchairs with the money from his `Days of Our Lives contract.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Moves Out
programme.desc: Everyone at Monicas dads birthday party finds it amusing that their middle-aged friend, eye-doctor Richard Burke, is dating a woman in her 20s - until Monicas parents learn that it is their daughter. Meanwhile, Chandler and Joey row over a dirty spoon. Is the apartment still big enough for both of them?

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: With their marriage on the rocks, uptight couple Cynthia and Jason convince their friends to join them on a luxury holiday geared towards healing relationship rifts. Arriving at the beautiful Eden resort, the four couples are in for a shock when they discover the punishing regime that awaits them at this island paradise.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Gary plays a Hollywood Director, trying to marshal the cast through an Indiana Jones style scene.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: In Dating App, singleton Greg chooses between Waynes butt detective, Colins obsessive alien and Ryans trashy fairy godmother. Guest Chris Lee joins.

programme.title: Drunk History
programme.sub-title: Q and Sal and Joel Dommett
programme.desc: Brian `Q Quinn and Sal Vulcanos tipsy take on a presidential disaster, and Chris ODowd stars in Joel Dommetts drunken Dambusters. Joe Wilkinson, Joe Thomas and Brett Goldstein also feature.

programme.title: Drunk History
programme.sub-title: Murr and Jessica Knappett and Lydia Rose Bewley
programme.desc: James `Murr Murray blasts through Billy the Kid with Mat Horne and Mat Baynton.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of four elementary school boys.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of four elementary school boys.

programme.title: Important Things With Demetri Martin
programme.desc: Part stream-of-consciousness sketch show, part stand up comedy, mixed with animation and music.

programme.title: Nigel Ng: The Haiyaa Special
programme.desc: Uncle Roger and his nephew Nigel Ng present The HAIYAA Special, filmed on their sold out world tour.

programme.title: Spin City
programme.sub-title: In the Heat of the Day
programme.desc: Carter is arrested by police when they mistake him for a mugger; Paul tries to prove that hes not racist after a Latino City Councilman misinterprets something he says.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Sig and John co-captain the Time Bandit, sparking a gold rush for crab out west. Chaos on the Titan Explorer forces Jakes crew to abandon ship.

programme.title: Barnwood Builders
programme.sub-title: Building the New England Barn in South Carolina
programme.desc: Mark Bowe and the guys take on their biggest build yet, resurrecting the massive New England timber frame from last season at a family retreat in South Carolina. Its six days of heavy lifting, precision craftsmanship and big fun.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: 13 Rue Madeleine
programme.desc: Rough and tough OSS agent Bob Sharkey oversees a special mission to determine the location of the factory where the Nazis are manufacturing their notorious flying bombs. Based on actual OSS accounts and use of intelligence agency footage.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: A soldier turned pacifist, recently returned from a bloody war, is forced into a confrontation with a bullying cattle baron. The disabled cattleman uses violence and scare tactics to push out smaller ranchers and farmers. He is so involved in his evil pursuits, he fails to notice the love affair being carried on by his wife and brother.

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected

programme.title: Discovering Film

programme.title: Tales of the Unexpected

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A man (Dick Van Dyke) and his greedy girlfriend (Stella Stevens) will get rich when his deceased aunts dog dies.

programme.desc: Revisit the career of Mary Cassatt through prints, pastels and paintings, exploring the often-overlooked Impressionists influence on how women appear in art.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Winter is here. The long-awaited seventh season of the worlds most talked about show begins.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a time before the pyramids, an evil king threatens to take over the world, so the leaders of the remaining tribes under threat call upon a desert warrior to help them defeat the wicked one and his brutal hordes. As the warrior battles against the evil around him, he is preparing for a final showdown that will decide if it is to be his destiny to become the great Scorpion King.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Beginning in ancient China, the ruthless Emperor Han will stop at nothing to gain control of the region. Many years on, in the 1940s, Hans tomb is discovered, and Rick OConnell and his wife Evelyn get drawn into a plot to resurrect the emperor and restore him to power.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, the last Gunslinger, must prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: One Shot
programme.desc: To prevent a terrorist attack on U.S. soil, a Navy SEAL team leader and a CIA analyst must retrieve a detainee from a secret compound while fending off an assault by insurgents.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Beginning in ancient China, the ruthless Emperor Han will stop at nothing to gain control of the region. Many years on, in the 1940s, Hans tomb is discovered, and Rick OConnell and his wife Evelyn get drawn into a plot to resurrect the emperor and restore him to power.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: One Shot
programme.desc: To prevent a terrorist attack on U.S. soil, a Navy SEAL team leader and a CIA analyst must retrieve a detainee from a secret compound while fending off an assault by insurgents.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Beginning in ancient China, the ruthless Emperor Han will stop at nothing to gain control of the region. Many years on, in the 1940s, Hans tomb is discovered, and Rick OConnell and his wife Evelyn get drawn into a plot to resurrect the emperor and restore him to power.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Blood for Dust
programme.desc: Travelling salesman Cliff is drowning under the weight of providing for his family and finds himself on a dangerous path after a chance encounter with a colleague who has a dark past. Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Swept into the sea during a family cruise, a young girl named Shenxiu stumbles upon a mysterious restaurant under the waves. There, she meets the scheming head chef and his ragtag crew of adorable otters and sarcastic walruses.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Two overly-imaginative pranksters accidentally hypnotise their headmaster into thinking that hes a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

programme.title: The Ogglies
programme.desc: Young Max meets the Ogglies, a family of green, garbage-eating creatures who live at the dump in the town of Smelliville. When a contractor plans to build a wellness temple at the dump, Max and his pal must hatch a plan to save the Ogglies home.

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Mumbles son Erik hasnt yet found his talents, and he goes with his friends to Adelie-land which is ruled by a penguin who can fly. When Erik returns to Emperor-land and finds them trapped under big walls of ice. Will Erik be able to save his family and friends before it is too late?

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Son of Memphis and Norma, little sweet penguin Mumble has a big problem: he cant sing a single note. In a world where everyone needs a heart song to attract a soul mate, Mumble feels he doesnt belong there. Our hero Mumble is the worst singer in the world, but he can tap dance brilliantly.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The plucky penguins join a special inter-species task force in an attempt to stop an evil doctor from taking over the world.

programme.title: 10 Lives
programme.desc: A pampered cat takes for granted the lucky hand he has been dealt after he is rescued and loved by Rose, a kind-hearted and passionate student. When he loses his ninth life, fate steps in to set him on a transformative journey.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood dreams of discovering an idea that will change peoples lives forever, and after several misguided attempts he may just have done it. Flint has invented a machine that can turn water into delicious food, and, when his first demonstration accidentally sends the machine shooting into the clouds, cheeseburgers begin raining down from the sky.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Discovering that his most-famous machine is now creating animal/vegetable hybrids, inventor Flint Lockwood and his friends venture forth to save the world from tacodiles, shrimpanzees and other creatures.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: Extinct
programme.desc: Op and Ed accidentally time-travel from the Galapagos Islands in 1835 to present-day Shanghai. They make their way through the city in confusion and make the horrifying discovery that the species to which they belong became extinct shortly after.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Two overly-imaginative pranksters accidentally hypnotise their headmaster into thinking that hes a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Deep Sea

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Two overly-imaginative pranksters accidentally hypnotise their headmaster into thinking that hes a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Reginas ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Reginas ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a retired widower in his 70s becomes senior intern at a fashion based e-commerce company. Jules Ostin, the founder, while first hesitant, soon learns to respect and even like her new intern despite their age difference.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.
